attributes.action: Get a fair minimum wage for all ages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you under the age of 21? or 18? do the same job as everyone else in your work but only getting paid minimum wage. This Petition is to make things fair, To make things heard. We make be young employee be we also need money to pay bills ect. If young people do the same job. its fair that they get the same pay. Everyone who works should be getting paid the same wage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
